original_text: Maybe somebody wants to take you to the judge. He says that you should give him your shirt. Give the man your shirt, and give him your coat too.
korean_text: 또 너를 고발하여 속옷을 가지고자 하는 자에게 겉옷까지도 가지게 하며

sentences.original_text: Maybe somebody wants to take you to the judge.
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 누군가가 당신을 재판관에게 데려가려고 할지도 모릅니다.

sentences.original_text: He says that you should give him your shirt.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신이 그에게 당신의 셔츠를 주어야 한다고 말합니다.

sentences.original_text: and give him your coat too.
